meanings.definition: A group of four men with joint authority or power.
meanings.sent1: The quadrumvirs met to discuss important matters.
meanings.sent2: The quadrumvirs made decisions together for the community.
meanings.sent3: The quadrumvirs had to agree unanimously, which led to some amusing debates.
meanings.sent4: Their unity made the quadrumvirs a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The quadrumvirs' authority was as solid as a four-legged table.

meanings.definition: A council or committee of four members.
meanings.sent1: The quadrumvirs gathered to plan the event.
meanings.sent2: The quadrumvirs voted on the new regulations.
meanings.sent3: The quadrumvirs' small size sometimes led to comical misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: Their efficiency as a quadrumvirs was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The quadrumvirs' decisions echoed through the halls of the council.
